snippet: The analysis could prove useful if it leads to a discussion about debt relief, but it also raises the risk that eurozone lawmakers will force Greece out of the euro.

byline.contributor: James Kanter contributed reporting from Brussels.

lead_paragraph: The analysis could prove useful if it leads to a discussion about debt relief, but it also raises the risk that eurozone lawmakers will force Greece out of the euro.

headline.main: I.M.F. Report Shines Uncomfortable Light on Greece’s Financing Gap
